underlying_goal: Redesign and update all specs across a multi-module Apify Actor project to reflect new research phase architecture patterns, using a teammate-spawn workflow for parallel execution
friction_detail: Claude failed to load the teammate-spawn skill file initially, prompting an angry correction from the user.
brief_summary: User wanted to redesign architecture specs across dozens of files using teammate-spawn workflows and architecture discussions, and all tasks were completed successfully with only one initial friction point around skill loading.
